tick() - Method in class zwars.GameObject
class inheriting GameObject has to override the tick method and update its necessary attributes in it.

ticks all the GameObjects currently in the game to update the values of their attributes and check necessary constraints.

tick() - Method in class zwars.threads.Spawn

tick() - Method in class zwars.tile.Tile
